tip.title: Tip

gettingStarted.title: 1. Getting Started
gettingStarted.desc: Create your workspace, confirm your email, and validate your setup before going live.
steps: Confirm your email to activate your account.
Complete your business profile in Business settings.
Open the Widget page to get your embed script.
Test the widget on your site and send a message.
gettingStarted.screenshot: Screenshot placeholder: Business profile and dashboard overview.

installWidget.title: 2. Install the Widget
installWidget.desc: Add the script to your website and verify that the widget appears and replies.
steps: Copy the embed script from Dashboard → Widget.
Paste it before the closing </body> tag on your site.
Publish the changes and refresh your site.
Open a conversation to verify messages arrive.
troubleshooting: Make sure the script is loaded on every page you want to support.
Disable ad blockers for a quick test.
Confirm your domain is allowed in Widget settings.
installWidget.screenshot: Screenshot placeholder: Widget settings with embed key.

customize.title: 3. Customize the Assistant
customize.desc: Make the assistant sound like your brand and answer accurately.
bullets: Update your business knowledge: services, policies, hours, and FAQs.
Set tone and instructions in Assistant settings.
Choose a default language and test with real questions.
Enable lead capture and notifications if you want follow‑ups.
customize.screenshot: Screenshot placeholder: Assistant settings + knowledge base.

billing.title: 5. Billing & Plans
billing.desc: Start your free trial and manage your subscription.
bullets: You get a 30‑day free trial on Starter or Growth.
Cancel anytime before the trial ends to avoid charges.
Upgrade or downgrade anytime from Billing.
Pro plans are custom — contact us for a tailored setup.

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.subtitle: You define the knowledge and goals. Aliigo does the rest.

step1.title: Create your account
step1.desc: Choose a plan, add a payment method, and start your 30-day free trial.

step2.title: Add business information
step2.desc: Services, hours, location, tone, and what a qualified lead looks like for you.

step3.title: Go live
step3.desc: Add a small snippet to your site and the assistant is live immediately.

q1.a: Aliigo is an AI assistant that lives on your website. It answers visitor questions and turns conversations into qualified leads.

q2.a: It’s a website assistant, not a script. It uses your business knowledge and adapts to each conversation.

q3.a: No. It handles first contact and qualification so your team only deals with real, high-intent conversations.

q4.a: Simple. We provide a small snippet for your website. Most businesses can go live the same day.

q5.q: Is Aliigo worth it with low traffic?
q5.a: Yes. Even a few missed inquiries can be expensive. Aliigo helps you respond instantly and capture opportunities you’d otherwise lose.
